name: Slime Party
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 42 with the theme "Running Out of Space".

Click and drag to move slimes around. Red ones will destroy floor tiles but blue ones will repair them. If the counter gets below 50% you lose!

  • Mun - Code
  • Rory - Art and Code

Created with Unreal Engine 4.20 and Blender 2.79.

There is a known bug involving fullscreen. We either need to figure out how to get Unreal to resize the canvas properly or use Unreal's fullscreen function.
